item.description:
Start of 2012 right with a New Years Day road race!  5K or 10K at 11am in Lowell.

Part of the Will Run For Beer Race Series.... Race #1.  (Check out WillRunForBeer.com for details about the series and to register.)

We will meet as a group in Braintree at 9am to carpool up to Lowell together as a group (details to follow).

**REGISTER EARLY**

Maxed out at 2000 runners!!

Click this for online registration and additional details.

http://www.lowell1strun.com/

Date: 1/1/12

Time: 11am Race Start Time- meeting at 9am in Braintree to carpool as a group.

Start: Lowell Elks Lodge - 40 Old Ferry Road, Lowell, Massachusetts

What: New Years 5K or 10K Road Race

Cost: $30 pre-registration fee, $40 day of race

GREAT extra's with this race, plus..... POST RACE PARTY!  (if the night before wasn't enough for you!)  :-)

Start your year off with the race with the best amenities:

  • Custom designed finisher medals by Ashworth Awards (click to view last year's finisher medal)
  • Technical T-shirts to the first 1500 entries
  • Technnical hats to the first 750 entrants
  • B-Tag timing by Yankee Timing with start/finish mats and a halfway mat (split) for the 10K
  • Commemorative personalized race bibs with your name printed on them for entries received by Dec 12, 2011 (click to view a sample bib)
  • Baggage claim
  • Tons of free parking
  • Heat Sheets (if temp is below 50 degrees)
  • Hot food at finish
  • Live Band
  • Digital Clocks at each Mile
  • Adult Beverages
  • Next day emailed personalized results
  • Fun, Fun, Fun
item.how_to_find_us: We will Meet in Braintree to carpool to Lowell

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Lowell 1st Run 5K or 10K Race
